relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucous membranes moist.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, gallops, or rubs.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, or rhonchi.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, nondistended, tender to palpation in the right lower quadrant.
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused.
